data.text:
We are accepting submissions and donations for Woman, Life, Freedom: Poems for the Iranian Revolution Please read the call for submissions and “What Kind of Poems Are We Looking For?”. Make sure you have no identifying information in the texts and translations you are submitting. That information should be submitted in the biography section of Submittable. Any submissions with names will be disqualified. Also, while anyone can submit, the poems need to be specifically related to the “Woman, Life, Freedom” uprising in Iran. Please spread the word about the fundraiser. We would like to pay our contributors, editors, and artists, as well as other expenses. See the links below: Submissions: https://lnkd.in/gxRRK5jq Donations: https://gofund.me/ab43b8e9 Questions? https://lnkd.in/gJgptN_6 Submit, donate, share. In solidarity, Bänoo Zan & Cy Strom Guernica Editions #Submissions, #Fundraiser, #CallForSubmissions, #CallForDonations, #anthology, #literature, #poetry, #poems, #WomanLifeFreedom, #Iran, #revolutoin, #PoetryOfWitness, #PoliticalPoetry, #ProtestPoetry, #solidarity, #SocialJustice, #WomensRights, #feminism, #dictatorship, #totalitarianism, #theocracy, #AntiOppression, #CivilRights, #HumanRights, #Share, #donate, #submit, #English, #translation

Submission deadline is approaching for: Woman, Life, Freedom: Poems for the Iranian Revolution We will really appreciate it if you spread the word. Links to submissions and background information as well as the online fundraiser are included in the Facebook event. The deadline will not be extended. Mailed or emailed submissions will not be considered. In solidarity, Bänoo Zan and Cy Strom #poetry, #English, #translation, #SpreadTheWord, #support, #WomanLifeFreedom, #Iran, #submissions, #CallForSubmissions, #donations, #anthology, #poems, #Revolution, #PoetryOfWitness, #PoliticalPoetry, #ProtestPoetry, #PoetryOfResistance, #peace, #justice, #WomensRights, #HumanRights, #dictatorship, #theocracy, #totalitarianism https://fb.me/e/4eD8marwG

Sharing your memorabilia Memorabilia can be a great way to connect with others. Here are a few ideas for sharing your memorabilia: Create a family album or scrapbook. This is a great way to share your memories with your family and friends. Display your memorabilia in your home. This is a great way to show off your collection and start conversations with guests. Donate your memorabilia to a museum or historical society. This is a great way to share your memories with the world.
